scene.name: intro
scene.option: Yeah, I have really powerful eyes.

scene.name: yes
scene.line: Me too. We should keep watching until it's about to disappear completely.

scene.name: no
scene.line: I guess it's too late, then. To say something romantic.
scene.option: It could be something about the boat being gone.

scene.name: romantic
scene.line: You'd better hurry up with a poem or something.
scene.option: A boat beneath a sunny sky ...
I don't know what to say.

scene.name: sunny-sky
scene.line: `A boat beneath a sunny sky, Lingering onward dreamily In an evening of July` —
No, no. It's not even sunny.

scene.name: afternoon
scene.line: `All in the golden afternoon Full leisurely we glide; For both our oars, with little skill, By little arms are plied` —
No, no. It's the middle of the night.

scene.name: no-poem
scene.line: It's OK. I like you anyway.

scene.name: poem-end
scene.line: It's OK. I like you anyway.
